column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ David dɛ
column3: Hwɛ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi David bisaa EWURADZE dɛ
column3: Ana monkɔ munkoku Filistiafo yi? Na EWURADZE see David dɛ

column2: "Na David ne mbarimba no see no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column5: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na burbur nkyii yɛbɔkɔ Keila nye Filistiafo akɔko."

column2: "Nna David kɔr do araa bisaa EWURADZE bio
column3: na EWURADZE buaa no dɛ
column5: sian kɔ Keila; na mibeyi Filistiafo no ahyɛ wo nsa."

column2: "Na David na ne mbarimba no sii mu kɔr Keila
column3: na wɔnye Filistiafo no kɔkoe
column5: na wokum hɔn oku kɛsenara. Nna David gyee Keilafo nkwa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Ahimelek ne ba Abiathar ruguan akɔ David nkyɛn wɔ Keila no
column3: nna asɔfotar kitsa ne nsamu na ɔdze kɔree."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul dɛ David aba Keila. Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn eyi no ahyɛ me nsa; na wɔatow no mu dɛ ɔakɛhɛn kurow a ɔwɔ nkuropon na adaban mu."

column2: "Na Saul hyiahyiaa ɔman no nyinara dɛ wɔnkɔ ɔsa
column3: wɔnkɔ Keila
column4: wonkotua David na ne mbarimba no."

column2: "Na David hun dɛ Saul rekyer no ho sa bɔn; na ɔsee ɔsɔfo Abiathar dɛ
column3: Fa asɔfotar no bra ha."

column2: "Nna David see dɛ
column3: EWURADZE
column5: w’akowaa atse no ampaara dɛ Saul rohwehwɛ aba Keila
column6: abɛsɛɛ kurow no wɔ me ntsi."

column2: "Ana Keilafo beyi me ahyɛ ne nsa? Ana Saul bɛba dɛ mbrɛ w’akowaa matse no? EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn e
column5: ka kyerɛ w’akowaa. Na EWURADZE see dɛ

column2: "Nna David see dɛ
column3: Ana Keila beyi emi na me mbarimba no ahyɛ Saul nsa? Na EWURADZE see dɛ

column2: "Nna David na ne mbarimba a wɔbɛyɛ ahaesia no
column3: soɛree
column5: na wɔkɔr beebiara a wobotum kɔ. Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul dɛ
column6: David efi nsa eguan efi Keila; na ogyaa dɛ ɔbɔkɔ."

column2: "Na David kɛtsenaa sar no do
column3: wɔ akoban no mu
column4: na ɔtsenaa koko do nkurow no mu wɔ Zif sar no do. Na daa nyinara Saul hwehwɛɛ no
column5: naaso Nyankopɔn ennyi no annhyɛ ne nsa."

column2: "Na David hun dɛ Saul epue robɔhwehwɛ eku no: ber a nna ɔwɔ Zif sar no do wɔ kwaa no mu."
"Na Saul ne ba Jonatan soɛree na ɔkɔr David nkyɛn
column3: wɔ kwaa no mu
column4: na ɔkɛhyɛɛ ne nsa dzen wɔ Nyankopɔn mu."

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro; na m’egya Saul ne nsa nnkɛka wo; na ebɛyɛ hen wɔ Israel do
column4: na mayɛ w’edziekyir; na m’egya Saul so nyim no dɛm."

column2: "Na hɔn beenu no dzii ahyɛmu wɔ EWURADZE n’enyim: na David tsenaa kwaa no mu
column3: na Jonatan sii mu kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Nna Ziffo no baa Saul hɔ wɔ Gibea
column3: dɛ
column4: Ana nnyɛ David na oesuma noho wɔ hɛn nkyɛn wɔ akoban no mu wɔ Hores kwaa no mu
column5: wɔ Hakila koko a ɔwɔ sar no no pomu afamu no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: ɔhen
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no hwehwɛ a ɔrohwehwɛ dɛ osian ba no tse no ara; na hɛn afamudze nye dɛ yebeyi no ahyɛ ɔhen ne nsa."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nhyira hom; osiandɛ hom ehu me mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Meserɛ hom
column3: hom nkɔ
column5: na wɔnhwɛ wonhu ne tsenabew mbrɛ n’adae wɔ
column6: na nyia oehu no hɔ: na wɔaka akyerɛ me dɛ ɔyɛ n’adze ndaadaa mu dɛ biribi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ
column3: na wɔnhyɛ sumabew a osumasuma noho wɔ hɔ nyinara nsew
column4: na wonsi no pi mbra me nkyɛn bio
column5: na menye hom nkɔ: na ɔbɛba dɛ
column6: sɛ ɔwɔ asaase no do a
column7: ɔno mobɔhwehwɛ no meyi no epue wɔ Juda mpempem nyinara mu."

column2: "Na wɔsoɛree
column3: na wodzii Saul n’enyim kan kɔr Zif: na David na ne mbarimba no dze nna wɔwɔ Maon sar no do
column4: wɔ Araba wɔ Jesimon no pomu afamu."

column2: "Na Saul na ne mbarimba no sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrokɔhwehwɛ no. Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ David: dɛm ntsi osianee baa ɔbotan no ho
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa Maon sar no do. Na Saul tsee no
column4: otsiiw David wɔ Maon sar no do."

column2: "Na ber a Saul nam bepɔw no n’afa ha
column3: nna David na ne mbarimba no so wɔnam bepɔw no n’afa noho: na David yɛɛ ntsɛm fii hɔ
column4: wɔ Saul no ho hu ntsi; osiandɛ Saul na ne mbarimba no bɔɔ David na ne mbarimba no hɔn ho aprɔw dɛ wɔrekyer hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo bi baa Saul hɔ dɛ
column3: Ka woho bra: na Filistiafo abɛta ahyɛ asaase no do."

column2: "Nna Saul gyaa David tsiw na ɔsanee
column3: na osii mu kɔr Filistiafo no hɔn do: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no Sela-hammah-lekot (asekyerɛ nye mpaapaamu botan)."

column2: "Na David fii hɔ sii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa En-gedi akoban no mu."
